body.name: 4-Tier Metal Storage Cabinet, 120LBS Weight Capacity Metal Locker Storage Cabinet with Shelves, 6 Doors Metal Storage Locker for Home Office, Garage, Gym(Black)
features: 【Stay Organized with Ease】 - Ustamio metal storage cabinet features 4 large shelves, providing ample storage. Bid farewell to cluttered office files and other items. You can even make use of the door backs for memos.

【Long-lasting Durability】 - Treated with a powder process, Ustamio metal locker storage cabinet is moisture-resistant and easy to clean. Its top-notch materials make it resistant to cracks and damage, ensuring a dependable storage solutions for years. Ustamio’s careful packaging safeguards products during delivery.
【Useful Details】 - Magnetic locks and rubber buffers ensure quiet and easy door closure. Adjustable feet maintain stability on uneven floors. Vent Door Design provides ventilation for stored items.

【Versatile Storage】 - Ustamio Storage Lockers flexibly meet your changing needs. Use them in the garage for tools, workshop for sports gear, laundry room for linens, or kitchen for pantry items and cups.
【Effortless Assembly】- Each part is numbered. Along with package, you will receive instruction, gloves and screwdriver, which will help you complete installation within 30 minutes.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Is your steel furniture rust-proofed? Yes, all our steel furniture undergoes a specialized rust-proofing process to ensure lasting beauty and durability even with extended use. Is the assembly process complicated? Do you provide instructions? We strive to simplify the assembly process. Clear instructions are included with all our furniture, allowing for quick self-assembly for most products. Is it easy to clean and maintain the steel furniture? Yes, they can be easily wiped clean with a damp cloth. For tougher stains, you can use a mild detergent for cleaning. What if I receive furniture that is damaged or defective? "Rest assured, if your item arrives damaged or with manufacturing defects, We will promptly arrange a return or replacement for you."

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great easy to built, packaging was perfect and its great quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice piece, problem with frame - WRONG, have update
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. ***update added below original review cuz no frame problem at all**Original: Instead of a wooden bureau, I'm using this piece for storage of clothing, bags, shoes and other items in the bedroom (I like clean, uncluttered surfaces.) The aesthetic is perfect for the space, the storage volume ideal and the price is reasonable. In fact very reasonable, as it's the cost of shipping (somewhere around $80) that elevates the price point so high.The piece comes well packed, but it's somehow not enough. The frame towards the bottom on my cabinet is bent in a way that makes it hard to open and close the doors. The upper two sets of doors work beautifully, which only emphasizes the problem with the bottom set of doors.It appears the risk of the frame bending may be a known problem due to the special packing around it, but unfortunately it wasn't enough this time.I think this large cabinet as a single unit is a design flaw. The frame cannot be made stronger because then the piece will be even heavier, and already the weight makes it almost impossible to work with. (You should hope the delivery is all the way into the room where it will live, it's that heavy.) This should have been made in smaller, modular pieces that can be locked together. Ikea used to sell the perfect lockers, which we had until my daughter took them, and they were four individual pieces assembled into one large piece slightly larger than this one. Unfortunately cannot get them anymore; the lockers they do sell at Ikea are tiny.I've alerted the seller to this problem. Depending on how that conversation goes I may be changing the star rating. This piece works well for me, if only it weren't a little bit broken.UPDATE HERE AS OF 1/23/24Not at all broken or warped! Now works as you see in the video.Two frame pieces were inserted correctly, but the third frame piece (where there was a problem with the door) was backwards.How do I know? I’ve just come off the most extensive product support interaction I’ve ever had with any vendor. If I could give 10 stars for service I would.I sent photos. They immediately saw the problem and MADE A VIDEO SHOWING ME HOW TO FIX IT. I mean, who does that? Some very nice people in China who believe in their product, that’s who.The frame piece went in backwards because the directions didn’t point out the directional need, but I suspect the directions will be upgraded after all this back and forth.There is still a small dent from shipping. The Ustamio staff have said they will make it right.They truly believe in customer service. We’re talking Olympic gold-medal, black-belt level service. I wish they sold everything I need because I now want to give them absolutely all of my business. Thank you Ustamio.
